name: tm10
effect: Teaches Hidden Power to a compatible Pokémon.
short_effect: Teaches Hidden Power to a compatible Pokémon. (Gen I: Double-Edge)

flavor_text.diamond_pearl: A variable move that changes type and power depending on the hidden ability of the Pokémon using it.
flavor_text.platinum: A variable move that changes type and power depending on the hidden ability of the Pokémon using it.
flavor_text.heartgold_soulsilver: A variable move that changes type and power depending on the hidden ability of the Pokémon using it.
